transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Nikhil ji Shivam baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.

Customer: haan

Executive: Sir aapne kal ek photo bheji thi chat box pe plywood machine ki.

Customer: toh haan woh aapne bola tha na ke agar aisa kuch dikhe toh bhejna isliye bheja tha.

Executive: Accha nahi woh actually aapne chat bot pe bhej di thi toh chat bot se toh receive mere ko abhi thoda delay hua maine dhyan nahi diya main apna personal number dena aapko bhul gaya tha ya aapne call message kiya tha mere paas aapke paas mera personal whatsapp hai kya?

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: hai hai aapka personal number mere paas.

Executive: haan toh mere ko personal kar loge na toh right now jaise uss samay jo problem hogi na hum main turant aapko connect karke turant hi problem solve kar dunga usme mujhe jo dikh raha hai Muktsar Punjab toh isme kya issue tha plywood machine mein thoda sa yaad hoga aapko.

Customer: woh basically plywood machine is completely different from yeh apna jo hydraulic wood splitter hai woh category hydraulic wood splitter aata hai lekin client ko required hai plywood machine.

Executive: client ko plywood machine required hai aur hydraulic wood splitter thoda sa alag hai matlab usne likha I am interested in hydraulic wood splitter.

Customer: theek hai haan woh manual plywood machine fir radda machine aur good working machine woh woh matlab alag alag jo machineries hai woh sab category hydraulic wood splitter mein aa rahe hai.

Executive: aur iski wajah se hydraulic wood splitter ka kya matlab hai?

Customer: samajh gaya samajh gaya hydraulic wood splitter ka kya kya matlab hai sir?

Customer: woh lakda beech se faadne ke liye firewood ke liye rehta hai.

Executive: okay

Customer: hydraulic wood splitter se jo lakda faadte hai na woh boiler mein aur usme jalane ke liye dalte hai uska furniture mein aur usme use nahi hota.

Executive: accha samajh gaya aur plywood machine

Customer: jo jungly jungly wood haan plywood machine fir apna jo normal wood splitter rehta hai jo chainso wala jo splitter rehta hai usse lakde ko shape deke fir furniture mein ya fir usme use karte hai.

Executive: okay okay

Customer: hydraulic wood splitter is only for firewood.

Executive: firewood okay.

Customer: samajh gaya theek hai toh ek cheez aur main shayad aapko guide skip reh gaya hoga mere dimag se jab main keh rahi thi jab aap jo aapne buylead bheji na mobile mein uske side mein ek bucket bhi aa raha tha dustbin type ka aa raha hoga ek star ka nishan aata hai agar aapko yaad ho screenshot hoga aapke paas toh haan screenshot se agar aap dhyan doge toh jahan par likha hota hai yesterday uske niche star bana hota hai aur uske niche ek dustbin ka nishan bana hota hai.

Executive: hmm

Customer: theek hai na jo jo shayad aapne last bar kiya bhi tha not 11th wale ka jiski wajah se aapko lead nahi aati.

Executive: woh haan haan woh maine haan haan haan woh ganda mach haan haan waha par ek bar mere ko yeh screenshot bhej de rahe ho theek hai main apni team se ek bar confirm kar leta hu theek hai plus aur dusri cheez yeh jo bucket hai usme adarsh ka options aata hai yaad hai usme dikhta hoga matlab aap jab dustbin karte hoge toh usme sabse niche ek options aata hai adarsh ka.

Executive: hmm

Customer: adarsh ke option ka fayda yeh hai ki usme hum yeh reason dal sakte hai toh automatically aap mujhe as a account manager bhi bhej sakte ho woh toh main apni team pe bhi confirm kar hi leta hu and aapke end pe bhi yeh cheeze confirm ho jayengi ki yeh cheez yeh lead hai ya mere kaam ki nahi theek hai uske alawa yeh cheez mere ko screenshot maine rakh liya aur abhi main ek second main aapko aap apna number bolo sir ek bar.

Customer: 96

Executive: nine six

Customer: 87

Executive: ek second ek second

Executive: 96

Customer: 87

Executive: 87

Customer: 97

Executive: 97

Customer: 03

Executive: 03

Customer: 84

Executive: 84

Executive: ispe maine agar aapko aage se kabhi bhi aisa buylead wagera ka kuch issue ho aap ispe bhej dena yeh jo bhi number maine abhi aapko bheja hai na abhi aap ek bar dekho hi thank you for your aapka message mere ko aa gaya hai hydraulic energy ka theek hai that is my only whatsapp number yeh complaint number aap jaise bhi isko chaho save kar lo in case yeh buylead wagera ka issue aata hai I hope abhi toh woh cheez nahi aayi hui hogi kal aayi hogi toh solve ho gayi hogi.

Customer: hmm

Executive: theek hai toh isko fir main abhi yeh jo concern tha isko close kar de raha hu and aage se kabhi bhi aayega toh mujhe batayega theek hai sir.

Customer: theek hai theek hai

Executive: okay close kar de raha hu theek hai okay hmm
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer sent a photo of plywood machine.

- Issue with leads not being relevant.



Resolution:

- Explained the difference between plywood and hydraulic machines.

- Explained how to use the 'Adarsh' option.

- Took customer's number for direct communication.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm with team about screenshot.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, plywood machine, hydraulic wood splitter, adarsh option, relevance
